The Missing Data Depot: The beginning of the social media era coincided w/ a nearly $40,000,000,000 collapse in newspaper advertising revenue. In 2006, American newspapers collected $49,275,402,572 in advertising revenue. In 2022, that number was only $9,760,830,024.
